title: Propose an Organizational Restructuring
description: Based on an analysis showing redundant roles, an agent must propose a new, leaner organizational structure.

tasks.description: Analyze a report that identifies several overlapping job functions in the 'Marketing' and 'Digital' departments.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the redundant areas.

tasks.description: Propose a new structure where the 'Marketing' and 'Digital' teams are merged into a single 'Growth' department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, logical recommendation for a new structure.

tasks.description: Create a high-level organization chart for the new proposed 'Growth' department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a new org chart reflecting the merged teams.
